# All Materials
This is a list of -all- materials available.
## Natural and Animal Products Water is a valuable resource in Nuclear14. You'll often find dirty or irradiated water in the Wasteland which must be cleaned and purified in order to get clean drinking water.
Radscorpion Tails can be butchered from Radscorpions with a knife and are used to produce antidote.
Brahmin Hide, hides and chitins are butchered off their respective animals.
For all other drinks and drink related products see the Bartending page.
## Ores, Metals and Derivatives Mine lead ore and process it at a forge to get lead ingots.
Mine sulfur ore and process it at a forge to get sulfur powder.
Mine Fertilizer ore from rocks and grind it to get fertilizer as a reagent.
Combine Fertilizer, Sulfur Powder and Carbon (from coal) to produce gunpowder.
## Wood and Wood Derivatives Wood planks can be crafted from wooden logs, obtained from trees. This can then be crafted into paper, and paper into cardboard.
## Other Materials Plastic can be obtained by melting down pre-war scrap made of plastic using a welder, by making it in a chemical reaction or by using a recycler if you can find one.
## Pre-War Products Mr Handy fuel can be found by scavenging the Wasteland and is a handy source of fuel for welders and generators.
